text: Jenna Bush Hager made an emotional return to the Today show on Thursday, November 30, after longtime anchor Matt Lauer was fired amid allegations of sexual harassment the day before. “ It was hard watching you all yesterday, ” Bush Hager said to Today host Hoda Kotb. “ When I started here, I remember someone saying, ‘ NBC, the Today show, is a family. ’ And that feels cliché. That feels like something people just say. But that ’ s true. So, when something rocks your family, it rocks all of us. ”'' When something rocks your family, it rocks all of us.'' @ JennaBushHager on Matt Lauer's dismissal from NBC News. pic. twitter. com / joWL9P9ocv
